Name: Gunlok
About the game: At the end of the 21st Century, robots finally enslaved mankind. Desperately, a few pockets of the human resistance fight on. You are Gunlok, a member of Earth’s Special Forces. Isolated during the robots’ uprising, you’ve now mastered your experimental battle armour and decided to return from the wilderness. Now, it’s time for revenge. Time to strike back, and bring warfare to the robots. • Team based gameplay allows you to control up to 5 characters. • Features 15 massive singleplayer levels, and a multiplayer mode (LAN only) • Personalised, customisable characters with upgradeable weapons. *Multiplayer notice: Because official multiplayer servers have been taken offline, playing over the Internet is no longer supported. Playing through a LAN is still available.
